import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import { getRecipeType, postRecipe } from '../actions'; import { useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux'; export function RecipeCreator() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const history = useHistory(); const [err, setErr] = useState({}); const diets = useSelector((state)=>state.diets) const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: '', resume: '', score: '', healthylevel: '', stepbystep: '', image: '', diets: [] }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getRecipeType()) }, [dispatch]); return (
